description: Comprehensive server monitoring dashboard showing CPU, memory, swap, disk usage, network, processes, and temperature metrics in real-time.

panels.title: CPU, Memory, Disk, and Temperature Overview

panels.description: Current CPU utilization across all cores as a percentage of total capacity.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Average CPU load over the last 5 minutes expressed as a percentage of total cores.
panels.title: Average System Load

panels.description: Percentage of RAM currently in use across the system.
panels.title: RAM Used

panels.description: Percentage of swap space currently in use.
panels.title: SWAP Used

panels.description: Percentage of root filesystem currently occupied.
panels.title: Root FS Used

panels.description: Total number of CPU cores available on the system.
panels.title: CPU Cores

panels.description: Total RAM installed on the system in bytes.
panels.title: RAM Total

panels.description: Time elapsed since the system was last booted, in seconds.
panels.title: System Uptime

panels.description: Total size of the root filesystem in bytes.
panels.title: Root FS Total

panels.description: Total swap space configured on the system in bytes.
panels.title: SWAP Total

panels.description: Number of active processes currently running on the system.
panels.title: Processes

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: RAM currently in use over time.
panels.title: Used Memory

panels.description: Percentage of disk space used over time.

panels.description: Disk I/O metrics showing reads, writes, and I/O time per device.
panels.title: Disk IO

panels.description: Network traffic for eth0, showing bytes received and transmitted per second.
panels.title: Network Traffic

title: Raspberry Pi System Monitoring
